message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This is my best offer, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that $10,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,500. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the deal.
